data.title: Desi Arnaz Jr: The tragic life of Desi Arnaz and Lucille Ball's son
data.meta_description: Desi Arnaz Jr is a retired American actor and gifted musician. Check out this article to know more about the tragic life of Desi Arnaz and Lucille Ball's son.
data.text:
Desi Arnaz Jr was born to celebrity parents who were best known for their work in I Love Lucy. He lived most of his life in the public eye, especially after he became an actor and musician in his prime. Like everyone else, he has had his fair share of ups and downs in life.

Who is Desi Arnaz Jr?

Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, alias Desi Arnaz Jr, is an actor and musician. He gained fame before birth because his parents were in the limelight.

He gained fame when he was still in his mother's womb. His mother starred in I Love Lucy when she was pregnant with him. Her pregnancy was part of the sitcom's storyline.

Is Desi Arnaz Jr still alive?

Yes, the actor and musician is still alive. Desi Arnaz Jr's age is 71 years as of 2024.

He was born on 19 January 1953, and his Zodiac sign is Capricorn. On the day he was born, his mother’s television character, Lucy Ricardo, gave birth to a son called Little Ricky.

Where is Desi Arnaz Jr from?

The actor was born in Los Angeles, California, United States of America, and his nationality is American. He resides in Boulder City, Nevada, United States of America.

Who are Desi Arnaz Jr's parents?

The musician's mother is the late Lucille Désirée Ball, while his father is the late Desiderio Alberto Arnaz y de Acha III (Desi Arnaz). He has a sister named Lucie Arnaz. Lucie is an actress who was born in 1951.

Desi Arnaz was a Cuban-American actor, musician, and bandleader. He was best known for playing Ricky Ricardo on the sitcom I Love Lucy.

On the other hand, Lucille Ball was an American actress, model, producer, studio executive, and comedian. She created the sitcom with Arnaz.

When did Desi Arnaz die?

Desiderio Alberto Arnaz y de Acha III, Desi Arnaz Jr's father, died on 2 December 1986. He was 69 when he died of numerous health issues. He was diagnosed with lung cancer in 1986.

On the other hand, Lucille Ball died on 26 April 1989 at 77. She was diagnosed with a dissecting aortic rupture on 18 April 1989.

She underwent a seven-hour surgery to repair her aorta and install an aortic valve replacement at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles after experiencing chest pains. She succumbed to a ruptured abdominal aortic rupture not directly related to her surgery.

Educational background

The actor went to elementary and high schools in Los Angeles. He proceeded to the University High School in West Los Angeles, California.

Career

The actor and musician learned how to play drums in childhood. At 12, he became a drummer with Dino, Desi, & Billy. His band released the songs I'm a Fool and Not the Lovin' Kind in 1965.

He took after his parents by becoming an actor. He has multiple acting credits. Some are listed in the table below.

From 2002 to 2007, the actor was vice-president of the board of Directors of the Lucille Ball–Desi Arnaz Centre in Jamestown, New York. He resigned because of a dispute with the executive director.

Boulder Theatre

In 1997, the actor bought the Boulder Theatre when it was on the brink of ruin. He renovated the cinema and made it the home of the Boulder City Ballet Company.

He owns the Historic Boulder Theatre and helps direct the non-profit Boulder City Ballet Company (BCBC).

Ricci, Desi, & Billy

In 1998, the actor went back to music. He toured with a new configuration of Dino, Desi & Billy called Ricci, Desi, & Billy. The group performed original material as well as other songs.

What is Desi Arnaz Jr's net worth?

The actor and musician has a net worth of $40 million. He made his fortune from his long-running acting and music career.

Relationships and marriages

It is known that romantic relationships contributed to the actor's tragic life. Desi Arnaz Jr started dating at a young age. He once said he was under the illusion of love at 13 and added that he was a playboy.

At 15, he became a father. He was in a relationship with model Susan Callahan-Howe in 1968. The two were 15 when they became parents to Julia Arnaz. Julia's paternity was proven in 1991.

At 17 and 23, he dated actress Patty Duke. He accompanied Duke to the 1970 Emmy Awards ceremony, where she won the Emmy for Outstanding Single Performance.

Lucille Ball, his mother, did not approve of her son's relationship with Duke. Duke became pregnant, and the two broke up.

After parting ways, Michael Tell, a writer and music producer, offered to Marry Duke. Their marriage lasted 13 days.

Duke gave birth to a son named Sean Astin. She told her son that Desi Arnaz Jr was his biological father, so the two formed a close bond. Later, a paternity test confirmed Sean Astin is Michael Tell's biological son.

Later, the actor dated entertainer Liza Minnelli. His mother disapproved of the relationship because she felt that Minnelli was too old for her son and she was a bad influence on him.

In May 1972, the actor announced his engagement to Minnelli. He accompanied her to the Academy Awards ceremony in March 1973, when she won the Academy Award for Best Actress. The engagement was called off in May 1973.

In 1979, the actor and musician married actress Linda Purl. The two had a short-lived marriage. They divorced in 1980. Purl is an American actress and singer. She is best known as Ashley in Happy Days, Sheila Munroe in Visiting Hours, and Helene in The Office.

On 8 October 1987, the actor married Amy Laura Bargiel. Bargiel was a professional dancer who went to the San Diego State University and the San Diego Ballet Company.

She was a member of Vassili Sulich's Nevada Dance Theatre, where she was a principal dancer for more than ten years. Bargiel and her husband lived in Boulder City, Nevada, until Bargiel's death in 2015. She died of cancer.

He legally adopted his second daughter, Haley. Haley was born on 17 December 1976. She was born from Bargiel's union to Gary Charf.

What happened to Desi Arnaz Jr?

From the moment he was born, the actor and musician was in the public eye. In 2015, he decided to step away from the limelight.

He relocated from Los Angeles, California, to Boulder City, Nevada, because he felt the urge to start a new and different life.

He said the move was driven by the need to know himself better. All his life, he was in the media because of his famous parents and not knowing who he was. He was trapped in a system that excluded reality.

What is Desi Arnaz Jr doing now?

The actor and musician is alive and well, contrary to rumours that he passed away. He retired from his acting and singing career. Today, Desi Arnaz Jr is leading a quiet life in Nevada.

How tall is Desi Arnaz Jr?

The retired actor and musician is 5 ft 11 in or 180 cm tall. He has silver hair and brown eyes.

Trivia

He was featured on the cover page of the American TV Guide Magazine titled Lucy's $50,000,000 Baby.

In April 1953, he appeared on the first cover of TV Guide with his mother.

He is a follower of Vernon Howard and attends meetings of Howard's New Life Foundation in Boulder City.

His granddaughter, Desiree S. Anzalone, Julia's daughter, passed away on 27 September 2020 at 31 after a spirited battle with cancer.

Desi Arnza Jr is a celebrity child who took after his famous parents. The actor and musician exited the public scene in 2015 to live a peaceful and quiet life.
